test.instr: (:ins (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (color X red) (sort X book) (type Y container) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (open X) (:cond (type X container) (sort X refrigerator))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X yellow))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (type X container) (sort X closet))) (:info (plate X) (:cond (sort X cup))) )
test.nl: Put the red book in the refrigerator. Open the door of the refrigerator. Pick up the yellow cup. Go to the closet.
